author: Indaris Nerothan
review: This place is owned by PLTA Property Management. Please read the reviews for their company before renting here. Theyre awful people and will try to scam you.

author: Em Sanders
review:
I just moved out so I feel safe writing a review without PTLA retaliating against me. They're a filthy bunch of rats in human skin.
The rent is cheaper here for a reason... This place is AWFUL! Do not rent here.
